alert.note: Alert for Beaverhead (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 24 at 7:18PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Beaverhead County through 800 PM MDT... At 717 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 14 miles west of Divide to 22 miles north of Jackson to near Wisdom to near Gibbonsville. Movement was northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Wisdom, Dewey and Wise River. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
